notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.

Doubtfully ascribed to Marvell although included in editions of his works and poems; ascribed also to Henry Savile. Cf. Margoliouth, H.M. Poems & letters of Andrew Marvell, 1927, v.1, p. 321-325; BM, also Wing CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
